questions.domain: Establish network connectivity by deploying wired and wireless devices
questions.question: A network technician is installing a new wireless network in a three-story office building. Users report strong signal on the first floor but weak or no signal on the third floor. Which solution would BEST resolve this issue?
options: Install a wireless repeater on the second floor
Replace the current wireless router with a model that supports 5GHz
Implement a mesh network with access points on each floor
Change the wireless channel from 6 to 11

questions.domain: Establish network connectivity by deploying wired and wireless devices
questions.question: A technician needs to connect two buildings that are 200 meters apart. The buildings need a reliable 10 Gbps connection. Which of the following is the MOST appropriate solution?

questions.domain: Establish network connectivity by deploying wired and wireless devices
questions.question: A network administrator is troubleshooting connectivity issues with a newly installed network printer. The printer has been assigned a static IP address and is connected to the network switch, but no computers can print to it. Using a laptop directly connected to the printer with an Ethernet cable works fine. What is the MOST likely cause of the issue?
options: The printer firmware needs to be updated
The static IP address conflicts with another device on the network
The printer drivers are not installed on the computers
The switch port is configured for the wrong VLAN

questions.domain: Establish network connectivity by deploying wired and wireless devices
questions.question: A company is setting up a new warehouse with inventory tracking devices that require wireless connectivity. The warehouse has metal shelving units throughout and operates machinery that creates electromagnetic interference. Which wireless technology should be implemented to provide the MOST reliable connectivity?
options: 802.11ax with multiple access points and frequency bands

questions.domain: Establish network connectivity by deploying wired and wireless devices
questions.question: A network technician is installing a high-speed wired connection between two floors of an office building. The distance is approximately 80 meters. There is significant electrical interference from nearby machinery. Which cable type would be MOST appropriate for this installation?

questions.domain: Establish network connectivity by deploying wired and wireless devices
questions.question: A small office has implemented a wireless network. Users report that the connection drops frequently when more than 15 people are connected simultaneously. The wireless router supports 802.11n and is centrally located. Which of the following is the MOST cost-effective solution?
options: Upgrade to an 802.11ax router with OFDMA support
Add a second wireless access point on a different channel
Implement QoS to prioritize important traffic

questions.domain: Establish network connectivity by deploying wired and wireless devices
questions.question: A network administrator is connecting a new branch office to the corporate headquarters. The distance between locations is 5 kilometers. The connection needs to support at least 1 Gbps throughput. Which of the following would be the MOST appropriate solution?
options: T1 leased line with channel bonding

questions.domain: Establish network connectivity by deploying wired and wireless devices
questions.question: A network technician is installing a new switch in a manufacturing facility. The environment has high levels of electromagnetic interference. The switch will support security cameras and industrial control systems. Which of the following should be used to connect the switch to the existing network?

questions.domain: Establish network connectivity by deploying wired and wireless devices
questions.question: A company is deploying IoT sensors throughout their warehouse. The sensors will be battery-powered and need to transmit small amounts of data periodically. Which wireless technology would be MOST appropriate for this deployment?

questions.domain: Establish network connectivity by deploying wired and wireless devices
questions.question: A network technician needs to connect multiple buildings on a campus that are within line of sight and less than 500 meters apart. The connection must provide at least 500 Mbps throughput and be secure. Which solution would be MOST appropriate?

questions.domain: Establish network connectivity by deploying wired and wireless devices
questions.question: A small business owner is setting up a network in their shop. The building has thick concrete walls, and wireless coverage needs to reach all areas. The business has 15 employees and various IoT devices. Which wireless access point configuration would provide the BEST coverage?
options: Single dual-band access point with high-gain antennas
Mesh network with three access points strategically placed
Two access points with directional antennas
One access point with a wireless signal booster

questions.domain: Establish network connectivity by deploying wired and wireless devices
questions.question: A company is deploying a new point-of-sale system that requires wired network connectivity. The store has an existing wireless network but needs to add wired connections to 20 registers spread throughout the retail floor. The building has a drop ceiling. What is the MOST efficient way to deploy this network?
options: Run individual Cat6 cables from the server room to each register
Deploy wireless-to-wired adapters at each register location
Install intermediate switches in strategic locations and run shorter cables to nearby registers
Use powerline adapters to avoid running new cables

questions.domain: Establish network connectivity by deploying wired and wireless devices
questions.question: An IT administrator is setting up a guest wireless network in a conference center. The requirements include supporting up to 200 simultaneous connections, providing adequate bandwidth for basic web browsing, and keeping guest traffic separate from corporate traffic. Which configuration would BEST meet these requirements?
options: Single 802.11ac access point with guest SSID on the same VLAN as corporate network
Multiple 802.11ax access points with guest traffic on a separate VLAN and throttled bandwidth
Dual-band 802.11n access points with MAC filtering for guest devices
802.11g access points dedicated solely to guest traffic

questions.domain: Understand and maintain network documentation
questions.question: A network administrator is documenting a newly implemented network. Which of the following should be included in the physical network diagram?
options: Device locations, model numbers, and cable runs
IP addressing scheme and subnet masks

questions.domain: Understand and maintain network documentation
questions.question: During an audit, a company discovers their network documentation is outdated. Several critical devices were added over the past year without being documented. Which of the following should be implemented to prevent this issue in the future?
options: Weekly network scans to automatically update documentation
A change management process requiring documentation updates for all network changes
Quarterly manual inventory of all network devices
Assignment of documentation responsibilities to specific network team members

questions.domain: Understand and maintain network documentation
questions.question: A network engineer needs to restore a router configuration after a hardware failure. The documentation team cannot locate the backup configuration file. Which of the following would have been the BEST practice to prevent this situation?
options: Using an automated configuration backup tool that stores configs in a centralized repository
Having network engineers email configuration backups to themselves after changes
Printing hard copies of all configuration files and storing them in a binder
Using version control software on the local technician's computer

questions.domain: Understand and maintain network documentation
questions.question: A company is preparing for a compliance audit and needs to document all network security controls. Which of the following would be MOST important to include in this documentation?
options: Firewall rules, ACLs, and security policies
Employee training records on network usage
Network performance metrics over the past year

questions.domain: Understand and maintain network documentation
questions.question: A network technician is troubleshooting a connectivity issue and needs to identify which switch port a particular workstation is connected to. Which network documentation would be MOST helpful in this situation?
options: Logical network diagram with IP addressing scheme

questions.domain: Understand and maintain network documentation
questions.question: A company has multiple locations with independent networks. Management wants to standardize network documentation across all sites. Which of the following would be the MOST efficient approach?
options: Have each site maintain their own documentation in whatever format works best for them
Create a centralized documentation repository with standardized templates and procedures
Outsource all documentation to a third-party provider
Implement automated network discovery tools without standardized documentation

questions.domain: Understand and maintain network documentation
questions.question: During a network upgrade, a technician discovers that the IP addressing scheme is poorly organized, making it difficult to identify which subnets are used for different purposes. Which documentation should be created to address this issue?

questions.domain: Understand and maintain network documentation
questions.question: A network administrator is creating documentation for a new network implementation. Which of the following would be the MOST important to document for disaster recovery purposes?

questions.domain: Understand and maintain network documentation
questions.question: After a network outage, a post-incident review identifies that the recovery time was extended because technicians couldn't locate the correct cable connections in the server room. Which of the following would BEST address this issue?
options: Labeling all cables and creating a cable management document
Installing color-coded cables for different network functions
Moving all servers to a cloud environment
Implementing redundant connections for all critical systems

questions.domain: Understand and maintain network documentation
questions.question: A company is implementing a new wireless network. Which of the following should be included in the network documentation to aid in future troubleshooting?
options: Access point locations, SSIDs, channels, and coverage maps
Wireless user passwords and personal device information
The cost of each access point and installation labor
Detailed biographies of the installation technicians

questions.domain: Understand and maintain network documentation
questions.question: During a security audit, a company is asked to provide documentation about their network segmentation strategy. Which of the following would BEST address this request?
options: Physical network diagram showing device locations
Logical network diagram showing VLANs, subnets, and security zones
List of all network device models and firmware versions
Network performance metrics and bandwidth utilization reports

questions.domain: Understand and maintain network documentation
questions.question: A network administrator needs to document the process for adding new devices to the corporate network. Which type of documentation would be MOST appropriate for this purpose?

questions.domain: Understand and maintain network documentation
questions.question: A company is implementing a new change management process for network changes. Which of the following would be MOST important to include in the documentation requirements?
options: Detailed before and after configurations with verification steps
The specific time of day when changes should be implemented
The cost justification for each change
Personal contact information for all network administrators

questions.domain: Understand the purpose of network services
questions.question: A company needs to implement a solution that will assign IP addresses automatically to devices joining the network. Which service should they implement?

questions.domain: Understand the purpose of network services
questions.question: A company wants to ensure that only authorized users can connect to their wireless network. Which network service would BEST meet this requirement?

questions.domain: Understand the purpose of network services
questions.question: A global organization needs to ensure that all network devices have synchronized time for accurate log correlation. Which service should they implement?

questions.domain: Understand the purpose of network services
questions.question: A network administrator needs to allow internal clients with private IP addresses to access the internet. Which network service is MOST appropriate for this purpose?

questions.domain: Understand the purpose of network services
questions.question: A company wants to implement centralized authentication for all network devices and services. Which of the following would be MOST appropriate?

questions.domain: Understand the purpose of network services
questions.question: A network administrator needs to monitor network device performance and receive alerts when thresholds are exceeded. Which protocol would be MOST appropriate for this purpose?

questions.domain: Understand the purpose of network services
questions.question: A company is implementing a voice over IP (VoIP) phone system. Which network service would help ensure consistent voice quality by prioritizing voice traffic over other types of traffic?

questions.domain: Understand the purpose of network services
questions.question: A network administrator needs to implement a service that will convert domain names to IP addresses for client requests. Which service should be implemented?

questions.domain: Understand the purpose of network services
questions.question: A company wants to implement a solution that will cache frequently accessed web content to improve performance and reduce bandwidth usage. Which service would BEST meet this requirement?

questions.domain: Understand the purpose of network services
questions.question: A company needs to implement a service that will securely transfer files between their main office and branch locations. Which of the following would be MOST appropriate?

questions.domain: Understand the purpose of network services
questions.question: A network administrator needs to implement a service that will prevent specific types of websites from being accessed by employees. Which of the following would BEST meet this requirement?

questions.domain: Understand the purpose of network services
questions.question: A company wants to implement a service that will allow remote users to securely connect to the internal network over the internet. Which of the following would be MOST appropriate?

questions.domain: Understand the purpose of network services
questions.question: An organization needs to implement a service that will distribute the load across multiple web servers to improve performance and availability. Which service would BEST meet this requirement?

questions.domain: Understand basic datacenter, cloud and virtual networking concepts
questions.question: A company is migrating from a traditional data center to a cloud-based infrastructure. Which of the following would be the MOST important consideration for network connectivity?
options: Increasing the number of physical switches
Implementing redundant internet connections with adequate bandwidth
Upgrading all workstations to the latest operating system
Replacing all copper cabling with fiber optic

questions.domain: Understand basic datacenter, cloud and virtual networking concepts
questions.question: A network administrator is designing a virtual network in a hypervisor environment. Which of the following virtual network components would provide separation between different application environments?

questions.domain: Understand basic datacenter, cloud and virtual networking concepts
questions.question: A company is implementing a hybrid cloud solution. Which of the following would be the MOST secure way to connect the on-premises data center to the cloud provider?
options: Direct Connect or ExpressRoute private connection

questions.domain: Understand basic datacenter, cloud and virtual networking concepts
questions.question: An organization is deploying a new application that requires high availability and fault tolerance. Which cloud deployment model would BEST meet these requirements?
options: Multi-availability zone deployment within a single region

questions.domain: Understand basic datacenter, cloud and virtual networking concepts
questions.question: A network administrator is implementing network segmentation in a virtualized environment. Which of the following would provide the MOST effective segmentation?
options: Using different physical NICs for each virtual network
Creating a single VLAN for all virtual machines
Using NAT for all virtual machine communication

questions.domain: Understand basic datacenter, cloud and virtual networking concepts
questions.question: A company is migrating their applications to containers. Which networking model would be MOST appropriate for a container orchestration platform?

questions.domain: Understand basic datacenter, cloud and virtual networking concepts
questions.question: A company is implementing software-defined networking (SDN) in their data center. Which of the following is a key benefit of this approach?
options: Elimination of all physical networking equipment
Reduced power consumption by network devices
Centralized control and programmability of the network
Compatibility with legacy networking protocols only

questions.domain: Understand basic datacenter, cloud and virtual networking concepts
questions.question: A network administrator needs to implement a solution that will provide east-west traffic isolation between application tiers in a data center. Which of the following would be MOST appropriate?
options: Implementing ACLs on the core router
Using private VLANs on access switches

questions.domain: Understand basic datacenter, cloud and virtual networking concepts
questions.question: A company is implementing a disaster recovery solution using a cloud provider. Which of the following would provide the LOWEST recovery time objective (RTO)?
options: Backup and restore from cloud storage
Pilot light environment with core services running
Warm standby environment with scaled-down version of production

questions.domain: Understand basic datacenter, cloud and virtual networking concepts
questions.question: A network engineer is designing a data center network that needs to support high-speed connections between server racks. Which topology would be MOST efficient for this purpose?

questions.domain: Understand basic datacenter, cloud and virtual networking concepts
questions.question: A company is implementing a private cloud infrastructure. Which network virtualization technology would allow them to extend Layer 2 networks across their data center?

questions.domain: Understand basic datacenter, cloud and virtual networking concepts
questions.question: A network administrator needs to implement a solution that will provide traffic isolation between different tenants in a cloud environment. Which of the following would be MOST appropriate?

questions.domain: Understand basic datacenter, cloud and virtual networking concepts
questions.question: A company is implementing a hybrid cloud solution that will span multiple cloud providers. Which of the following would be the MOST important consideration for this deployment?
options: Using the same hypervisor across all environments
Implementing consistent identity and access management
Standardizing on a single operating system
Using identical hardware in all locations

questions.domain: Monitor network activity, identifying performance and availability issues
questions.question: A network administrator notices that network performance degrades significantly during certain times of the day. Which tool would be MOST helpful in identifying the cause?

questions.domain: Monitor network activity, identifying performance and availability issues
questions.question: Users report that accessing a specific application server is slower than usual. The network administrator wants to determine if the issue is related to network latency. Which tool would be MOST appropriate?
options: ICMP echo requests (ping) with timing statistics

questions.domain: Monitor network activity, identifying performance and availability issues
questions.question: A network monitoring system generates an alert indicating high CPU utilization on a core switch. Which of the following could be the MOST likely cause?

questions.domain: Monitor network activity, identifying performance and availability issues
questions.question: A network administrator wants to create a baseline of normal network traffic patterns to help identify anomalies. Which of the following would be the MOST effective approach?
options: Monitor network traffic for 24 hours on a weekend
Collect network statistics during peak hours only
Monitor network traffic over several weeks capturing various business cycles
Analyze traffic during a network outage

questions.domain: Monitor network activity, identifying performance and availability issues
questions.question: A company is experiencing intermittent connectivity issues with their internet connection. The network administrator wants to monitor the connection quality over time. Which tool would be MOST appropriate?
options: Network uptime monitor with continuous ping tests

questions.domain: Monitor network activity, identifying performance and availability issues
questions.question: A network administrator notices that a switch port is showing excessive errors. Which of the following would be the MOST likely cause?

questions.domain: Monitor network activity, identifying performance and availability issues
questions.question: Users report that network performance degrades significantly every day at 2:00 PM. Which of the following would be the MOST effective first step in troubleshooting this issue?
options: Monitor network traffic patterns at the suspected time
Reboot all network devices at 1:55 PM

questions.domain: Monitor network activity, identifying performance and availability issues
questions.question: A network administrator wants to identify the path that traffic takes to reach a specific destination and identify where latency occurs. Which tool would be MOST appropriate?

questions.domain: Monitor network activity, identifying performance and availability issues
questions.question: A company is experiencing slow network performance that appears to be affecting all applications and services. Which of the following would be the MOST effective first step in diagnosing the issue?
options: Monitor bandwidth utilization on core network links

questions.domain: Monitor network activity, identifying performance and availability issues
questions.question: A network administrator notices that a particular subnet is experiencing packet loss. Which tool would be MOST helpful in determining if the issue is related to network congestion?

questions.domain: Monitor network activity, identifying performance and availability issues
questions.question: Users report that they occasionally cannot access network resources. The issue seems to occur randomly and resolve itself. Which of the following would be the MOST likely cause?

questions.domain: Monitor network activity, identifying performance and availability issues
questions.question: A network administrator wants to ensure that network devices send alerts when specific thresholds are exceeded. Which protocol would be MOST appropriate for this purpose?

questions.domain: Monitor network activity, identifying performance and availability issues
questions.question: A network monitoring system reports that a critical server is offline, but users report they can still access the server's services. Which of the following would be the MOST likely cause?
options: The monitoring system is using incorrect credentials
The server has multiple network interfaces, and the monitored one is down
The monitoring system is misconfigured with the wrong IP address
Users are accessing a redundant server

questions.domain: Implement network hardening techniques
questions.question: A network administrator wants to prevent unauthorized access to the company's wireless network. Which of the following would provide the MOST secure authentication method?

questions.domain: Implement network hardening techniques
questions.question: A company wants to implement a defense-in-depth strategy for their network. Which of the following combinations would BEST implement this concept?
options: Multiple firewalls of the same brand

questions.domain: Implement network hardening techniques
questions.question: A network administrator wants to prevent unauthorized devices from connecting to the network. Which of the following would be the MOST effective solution?

questions.domain: Implement network hardening techniques
questions.question: A company's network uses multiple VLANs to segment traffic. What additional security measure should be implemented to control traffic between these segments?
options: Implementing ACLs or firewall rules between VLANs

questions.domain: Implement network hardening techniques
questions.question: A network administrator wants to prevent attackers from accessing sensitive information transmitted over the network. Which of the following would be the MOST effective solution?

questions.domain: Implement network hardening techniques
questions.question: A company is concerned about potential DoS attacks against their public-facing servers. Which of the following would be the MOST effective mitigation?
options: Using strong passwords on all servers

questions.domain: Implement network hardening techniques
questions.question: A network administrator is configuring a new firewall. Which of the following represents the MOST secure default stance?
options: Allow all traffic and block specific threats
Block all traffic and allow only necessary services
Allow internal traffic and block external traffic
Block known malicious IP addresses only

questions.domain: Implement network hardening techniques
questions.question: A company wants to secure their wireless network. After implementing WPA2-Enterprise, what additional measure would MOST improve security?
options: Implementing a separate guest network with isolation

questions.domain: Implement network hardening techniques
questions.question: An organization needs to secure administrative access to network devices. Which of the following would be the MOST effective approach?
options: Limiting administrative access to business hours

questions.domain: Implement network hardening techniques
questions.question: A network administrator wants to prevent users from connecting unauthorized wireless access points to the network. Which of the following would be the MOST effective solution?
options: Implementing 802.1X authentication on all switch ports
Regular wireless scanning for rogue access points

questions.domain: Implement network hardening techniques
questions.question: A company wants to ensure that only authorized applications can communicate through their firewall. Which type of firewall would BEST meet this requirement?

questions.domain: Implement network hardening techniques
questions.question: A network administrator wants to monitor for potential network intrusions without actively blocking traffic. Which tool would be MOST appropriate?

questions.domain: Implement network hardening techniques
questions.question: A company is concerned about potential insider threats accessing sensitive data. Which of the following would be the MOST effective mitigation?
options: Implementing full disk encryption on all workstations
Deploying a Data Loss Prevention (DLP) solution

questions.domain: Manage, configure, and troubleshoot network infrastructure
questions.question: A network administrator is configuring a new router. After setting up the interfaces and routing, users still cannot access the internet. The administrator confirms that the router can ping external addresses. What is the MOST likely cause of the issue?
options: The default gateway on client computers is incorrect
The router's firewall is blocking traffic
NAT is not configured on the router
DNS settings are incorrect on the router

questions.domain: Manage, configure, and troubleshoot network infrastructure
questions.question: A network technician needs to configure a new VLAN on a switch. Users in this VLAN need to communicate with users in other VLANs. What should be configured to enable this communication?

questions.domain: Manage, configure, and troubleshoot network infrastructure
questions.question: A network administrator has configured a new DHCP server, but clients are not receiving IP addresses. The administrator confirms that the DHCP server is running. What is the MOST likely cause of the issue?
options: DHCP relay is not configured on the router
The clients have static IP addresses
The DHCP server has the wrong subnet mask

questions.domain: Manage, configure, and troubleshoot network infrastructure
questions.question: A network administrator notices that one of the switches in the network is causing a loop, resulting in broadcast storms. Which protocol should be properly configured to prevent this issue?

questions.domain: Manage, configure, and troubleshoot network infrastructure
questions.question: A company has two internet connections from different ISPs for redundancy. They want traffic to automatically switch to the secondary connection if the primary connection fails. Which technology should be implemented?

questions.domain: Manage, configure, and troubleshoot network infrastructure
questions.question: A network administrator needs to configure a router to advertise routes to neighboring routers. The network consists of Cisco and Juniper routers. Which routing protocol would be MOST appropriate?

questions.domain: Manage, configure, and troubleshoot network infrastructure
questions.question: A network administrator is configuring QoS on a network to prioritize VoIP traffic. Which of the following would be the MOST important QoS mechanism for voice traffic?

questions.domain: Manage, configure, and troubleshoot network infrastructure
questions.question: A network administrator needs to configure a network device to forward traffic based on MAC addresses. Which device should be used?

questions.domain: Manage, configure, and troubleshoot network infrastructure
questions.question: A network technician is troubleshooting a connectivity issue between two VLANs. The technician confirms that the switch configuration is correct. What device should the technician check next?

questions.domain: Manage, configure, and troubleshoot network infrastructure
questions.question: A network administrator is configuring a wireless controller. Access points are connecting to the controller, but clients cannot connect to the wireless network. What is the MOST likely cause of the issue?
options: The SSID is not configured on the controller
The access points are using the wrong channel
The wireless controller's management interface is down
The clients have outdated wireless drivers

questions.domain: Manage, configure, and troubleshoot network infrastructure
questions.question: Users report that they can connect to the internal network but cannot access the internet. The network administrator confirms that the default gateway is correctly configured. What is the MOST likely cause of the issue?
options: The DNS server is not responding
The DHCP server is not assigning IP addresses
The firewall is blocking outbound traffic
The switch ports are not configured correctly

questions.domain: Manage, configure, and troubleshoot network infrastructure
questions.question: A network administrator needs to configure a router to connect to an ISP that uses PPPoE. Which interface configuration is required?
options: Static IP address with default gateway

questions.domain: Manage, configure, and troubleshoot network infrastructure
questions.question: A network administrator is configuring a router to connect multiple branch offices using site-to-site VPNs. Which protocol would be MOST appropriate for this purpose?
